**About**

This is the website of the **Language Technology and Data Analysis Laboratory (LADAL)** of the [School of Languages and Cultures](https://languages-cultures.uq.edu.au/) at the [University of Queensland](https://www.uq.edu.au/), Australia.


**License**

This website was created by Martin Schweinberger as member of the *Digital Team* of the *School of Languages and Cultures* of the *University fo Queensland*, Australia. It was freely released under GPLv3 in June 2020. 


**Citation**

If you use (parts of) it for your own research or in your teaching materials, please cite the individual subpages as shown at the bottom of each page or reference it as:

Schweinberger, Martin. 2020. *The Language Technology and Data Analysis Laboratory (LADAL)*. Brisbane: The University of Queensland, Australia. GPLv3 (https://slcladal.github.io).
